Package particles

Class ParticleSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • particles.ParticleSystem
  • public class ParticleSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Particle System class, responsible for updating the state of all particles
    Author:
    Stefan

      • getDimension

        The dimension of the resulting one dimensionale ode
        Returns:
        dimension of differential system

      • getState

        public void getState​(float[] state)
        Returns the state, i.e. all positions and velocities of all particles in a big float array
        Parameters:
        state -

      • setState

        public void setState​(float[] state)
        Sets the states of all particles
        Parameters:
        state - Contains all the states of all particles. The ordering for particle 0 is x0.x, x0.y, x0.z. v0.x, v0.y, v0.z, x1.x, and then all other particles follow in the same order

      • getDerivative

        public void getDerivative​(float[] deriv,
                          float t)
        Computes the right hand side of the Newton equation for time t. The result is put into a float array
        Parameters:
        deriv - The value of the right hand side of the Newton equation at time t
        t - Time for which we can to compute the rhs

      • clearForces

        Sets all forces to zero
